DOC.criteria: 30 men 30 woman Age 18 65 year BMI 25.0 32.0 Kg/m² fast glucose < 126 mg/dL Blood pressure < 140/85 mm Hg . Hypertension stable drug regimen use 2 few antihypertensive acceptable . Total plasma cholesterol < 240 mg/dl , LDLcholesterol < 160 triglyceride < 400 mg/dl . Hyperlipidemia stable medication regimen use single antihyperlipidemic drug acceptable .
